expresses the product of the probability that the bite of an infectious vector will lead to the successful infection of a susceptible host p, and the probability that a susceptible vector that bites an infectious host will become infected q with the vector competence ϕ( T). The mortality rate is δ( T) and the extrinsic inoculation rate is EIP.
